explains: n. 康复；自然（祈祷）疗法
v. 治疗（heal 的现在分词）
wordGroup: wound healing 创伤修复，愈合；伤口愈合
healing effect 愈合；弥复效应
spiritual healing 精神治疗；灵性治疗

sentences.en: A muscle tear will leave a scar after healing.
sentences.cn: 肌肉撕裂在治愈后会留下伤疤。

sentences.en: They are transfigured by the healing powers of art.
sentences.cn: 他们因艺术的治愈力量而变得容光焕发。

sentences.en: The wound is healing nicely and the patient is healthy.
sentences.cn: 伤口在很好地愈合，病人情况良好。
